column1: Singanallur Assembly Constituency is a legislative Constituency of Coimbatore district.It contains 18 wards of the Coimbatore which include the neighborhood of Singanallur. The Constituency lies in the Eastern part of the city.The important landmarks of the Constituency are Coimbatore International Airport
column4: TIDEL Park Coimbatore and ESI Medical College Hospital . It is a part of the Coimbatore (Lok Sabha constituency).
